entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
